author: craigmcc
msg: Correct typos in the example web.xml file included in the Tomcat 4
"Application Developer's Guide".
Submitted by:	Wooyoung Kim <woo_young@hotmail.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: Add Rob Slifka's "introduction.xml" document to the tree, with a few
cleanups.  Quick review comments:
- Please use an editor that wraps lines at <= 80 characters.  Otherwise
it is difficult to edit this file in many editors.
- There were several incomplete paragraphs at the bottom, so I took a
few liberties at completing them.
- Given the way that the overall document tree takes shape, the content
of this file needs to be reviewed.  For example, the "terminology"
section will probably deserve its own page, while the rehash of the
directory structure is probably redundant with the contents of the
"README.txt" file.

author: remm
msg: - Add a new combined mode for logging (logs the referer as well as the user-agent).
- New alias name for the patterm (combined).
- Patch submitted by Michael Smith <msmith at speedlegal.com>.

author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate the current set of Catalina Functional Specifications to the new
documentation format.  (The old versions will be removed from
catalina/docs/dev/xdocs when we are done).

author: craigmcc
msg: Pick up the WEB-INF directory when building the tomcat-docs webapp.
Make the project-specific logo URL relative to {$relative-path}.
